thread.title: BUZZ-Minimum wage stocks: back in the spotlight
thread.title_full: BUZZ-Minimum wage stocks: back in the spotlight

title: BUZZ-Minimum wage stocks: back in the spotlight
text:
598.50 +1.50 
** Stocks Buzz Minimum Wage basket continues underperformance after more negative comments from JD Wetherspoon and Whitbread (LSE: WTB.L - news ) 
** Basket of 20 UK companies exposed to cost inflation from a sharp rise in the national minimum wage - primarily composed of outsourcers, leisure chains and retailers - expected to underperform on a 3-5 year view as hikes take place, but has already seen short-term selling pressure 
** Wetherspoon chairman reiterates harmful impact of new minimum wage - says wages make up around 30 pct of sales v 10 pct for supermarkets. Link: http://on.ft.com/1iCngSo 
** Whitbread on Tuesday became the latest company to warn of minimum wage impact, saying it will take on fewer workers 
** Credit Suisse (Other OTC: CDSSF - news ) said on Thursday it expects Â£60m annual increase in wage costs for WM Morrison 
** Other companies in the basket that have already warned or been cut by brokers: Interserve (LSE: IRV.L - news ) , Serco , Restaurant Group (Other OTC: RSTGY - news ) 
** Stocks Buzz Minimum Wage Basket currently underperforming FTSE 350 by 2 pct since inception
